H0.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen story, who slept in a walnut shell for a cradle. The Little Mermaid

H1.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen story, who slept in a walnut shell for a cradle. The Princess and the Pea

H2.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen story, who slept in a walnut shell for a cradle. The Steadfast Tin Soldier

H3.text: In the Hans Christian Andersen story, who slept in a walnut shell for a cradle. Thumbelina

A4.text: Thumbelina, asleep in her walnut-shell cradle, is carried off by a toad.
